member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Chars.K_Char
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<char> derived type.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Chars.K_Char`1
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<char, K_Char<TSelf>> derived type.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Chars.K_CharArray
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<char[]> type.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Chars.K_CharArray`1
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<char[], K_CharArray<TSelf>> derived type.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Chars.Char`1
member.summary: The class provides a const argument provider that wraps the value from another const argument provider.
member.typeparam: The const argument provider type containing the value to wrap.
member.remarks: This class can be useful when creating domain-specific const argument providers, such as default values, when a const argument provider's value needs to be wrapped for use in a different context.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Chars.CharArray`1
member.summary: The class provides a const argument provider that wraps the array from another const argument provider.
member.typeparam: The const argument provider type containing the array to wrap.
member.remarks: This class can be useful when creating domain-specific const argument providers, such as default values, when a const argument provider's value needs to be wrapped for use in a different context.
